t: Amazon announces new MMO: Throne and Liberty | TechRadar
s: June 8, 2023 - Amazon Games has announced a brand new MMO at E3 2023. Entitled Throne and Liberty. Developed by genre veterans NCSoft of Guild Wars 2 fame, Throne and Liberty promises a sweeping high fantasy story where heroes transform into animals at will. Though Throne and Liberty's initial trailer looks promising, the upcoming title will have its work cut out for it if it's to be counted among the best MMOs ...
